org.openmuc.jdlms.client.communication
Interface IUpperLayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Connection, ConnectModule, DisconnectModule, HdlcClientLayer, LNConnection, SNConnection, TcpClientLayer, UdpClientLayer
public interface IUpperLayer

This interface provides callback methods that lower layer connection objects use to send data and disconnection messages to upper layer connection objects. If an object wants to receive data from a lower layer connection, it has to implement this interface

Method Summary
 void dataReceived(byte[] data)
          Callback method, indicating that data has been received from the remote end point.
 void remoteDisconnect()
          Callback method, indicating that the remote end point closed the connection.
 

Method Detail

dataReceived

void dataReceived(byte[] data)
Callback method, indicating that data has been received from the remote end point. If the lower layer adds frame header or footer around the sent data, these headers have to be already stripped at this point

Parameters:
data - The received data as raw byte array.

remoteDisconnect

void remoteDisconnect()
Callback method, indicating that the remote end point closed the connection. This method is provided to allow the upper layers to gracefully close the connection and clean up.
